Tool

NameSoil Texture Classification for Tables
ID20
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2015

Description

Derive soil texture classes with USDA scheme from sand, silt and clay contents. 1 - Clay 2 - Silty Clay 3 - Silty Clay Loam 4 - Sandy Clay 5 - Sandy Clay Loam 6 - Clay Loam 7 - Silt 8 - Silt Loam 9 - Loam 10 - Sand 11 - Loamy Sand 12 - Sandy Loam Reference: USDA NRCS Soils Website

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Table Table (input)TABLE
Options
SandTable fieldSANDsand content given as percentage
SiltTable fieldSILTsilt content given as percentage
ClayTable fieldCLAYclay content given as percentage
TextureTable fieldTEXTUREsoil texture
